alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Lavaca to near Green Lake. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Port Oconnor, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Indianola, Magnolia Beach, Schicke Point, Long Mott, Olivia, Green Lake, Port Alto and Tivoli. This includes US Highway 87 between mile markers 828 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
